name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A Chinese soldier named "A Pao Ge" who joined the army in Russia wrote: Does Sino-Russian friendship really exist? The battalion commander wanted to leave all the Chinese on the front line without withdrawing any of them, and then find a reason to report them missing to his superiors.
Before the mission, the battalion commander also confiscated our bank cards, and our two Apple phones were also taken by the battalion commander.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a large number of netizens sent private messages to the official account of the "All-China Federation of Trade Unions", asking questions such as when the 8-hour work system can be implemented. 
Currently, the official account of the "All-China Federation of Trade Unions" has turned on the "ban comments" mode.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Chinese diplomat Xu Wei was expelled for urging Paraguay to recognize China instead of Taiwan, saying that this choice would benefit Paraguay. Paraguay accused him of interfering in its internal affairs.
It is reported that Paraguay is Taiwan's only remaining diplomatic ally in South America.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: TikTok is one step closer to being banned in the United States. On December 6, three judges of the U.S. Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit rejected TikTok's request to overturn the bill. The bill requires TikTok's parent company ByteDance to sell TikTok to a non-Chinese company by January 19, otherwise it will face a U.S. ban.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 27, an explosion occurred at the Menzigou Gold Mine in Pan'an Township, Xiaojin County, Aba Prefecture, Sichuan Province. The drill bit hit the explosive left behind, causing an explosion, which caused a man to remove his left eyeball and blurred vision in his right eye. The injured believed that this was a work-related injury, but the mine owner not only failed to provide reasonable compensation and treatment, but also tried to shirk responsibility and blamed the accident on the injured. The injured then petitioned and was detained for five days, and was accused of "stealing national resources". The injured felt very wronged and helpless about this accusation. He said that he came here through an introduction and worked for only 5 days. He knew nothing about the operation and management of the gold mine and did not gain any vested interests. He questioned: "Is my eye blinded by the explosion, and justice has also abandoned me?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The truck driver who jumped off the elevated bridge in Zhengzhou, his last life video before leaving home on the day of the jump, and the grief reaction of his family members after learning the news of the jump were posted on Douyin by his family.
The family has two children, one of whom is only four years old and in kindergarten.
The driver who jumped off the bridge was also working for his boss as a truck driver

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 30th, Shanxi Luliang, a farmer reported in real name that Shanxi Coking Coal occupied farmland and abandoned coal slag to cause pollution
December 3rd, Shaanxi Weinan, Pinyang Zijun Community, owners protested that they had paid heating fees but did not receive heating
December 3rd, Shaanxi Xianyang, Qindu District Government, workers demanded wages
December 4th, Guangdong Meizhou, Zhihao Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. workers marched to demand wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 2, Shaanxi Xi'an Weiyang District Hubei Village resettlement community project workers demanded wages and blocked the door with iron bars.
The construction unit sent people to remove the iron bars, saying that the money had been settled to the relevant company, and used the radio to warn that occupying land to demand wages is illegal

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 5th, Guigang, Guangxi, Wuyue Plaza, owners put up banners to protest against high property management fees, which even exceeded the rent, and threatened to cut off water and electricity to pay the property management fees

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 3, Xingtai Nanhe District Dongfang Yufu owners gathered to defend their rights, accusing the developer of fraud and demanding to return their houses

December 4, Ningxia Wuzhong Xiakou Town Tanqiao Village villagers collectively reported that the fur factory polluted the tap water source

December 5, Zhejiang Haining AIMILA Clothing Co., Ltd. Workers threatened to jump off the building to demand wages, and the blogger said that 26 clothing companies have run away this month

December 6, Guangxi Guiping City Xishan Town Jingang Mingyuan owners protested against the property using the common area to build valves and collect parking fees

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 2, Sichuan Nanchong Peng'an Jinhong Sun City owners gathered to defend their rights due to the underground parking fee issue
December 6, Hunan Zhuzhou Liling City Chashan Town Xiaoxi Village villager Wang Junhua faced the leader alone to protest the land acquisition issue. The land acquisition is related to the Shanghai-Kunming Expressway project
December 6, Henan Zhengzhou Yuexiu Jinyue Wenhua owners gathered to protest quality issues and refused to accept the house

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 6, the Reagan National Defense Survey recently conducted a questionnaire survey of 2,510 adults across the United States. The poll results showed that if China invaded Taiwan, 73% of the respondents said they would support formal recognition of Taiwan as an independent country; 66% supported imposing economic sanctions on China; 58% supported the deployment of US military assets in the region; 56% agreed to provide Taiwan with more military equipment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 6, Changchun, Jilin. A man posted a video saying that a tanker truck loaded with dangerous goods drove into a soybean oil factory.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Yoon Seok-yeol made a televised speech this morning (7th). Yoon Seok-yeol expressed his sincere apology to the people and that there would definitely not be a second martial law.
Yoon Seok-yeol also said that he would leave the future political stability plan, including the rest of his term, to the People's Power Party.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A U.S. federal appeals court ruled on Friday that Congress is allowed to ban TikTok for national security reasons. The ban does not deem it a crime for U.S. users to continue using the app, but it prohibits mobile app stores such as Google and Apple from allowing users to download or update the app.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 5, a netizen posted a video saying that his account was blocked because he was posting comments about "Taiwan independence" on Twitter. Then the police called him because of circumventing the firewall and asked him to delete the software. The netizen said that he just wanted to complain about "Taiwan independence" and would never get involved in such things again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 7 (Released) Handan, Hebei. A police officer from Lingyuan Police Station was exposed online for secretly spraying pepper spray on a guest nearby while leaving a bar.
After the police left, the guests immediately felt uncomfortable and left their seats one after another.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 7, Chengdu, Sichuan. A banner at a construction site reads "Protect the legitimate rights and interests of migrant workers" and "Strike hard against malicious wage demands"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the news that "Ms. Bu, a female master's degree holder in Shanxi, had a son and a daughter after she was found after suffering from mental illness for more than ten years" has caused heated discussions.
On the social platform, an account suspected to be Zhang appeared. The account posted a photo of him and Ms. Bu, and wrote: "I love my wife". The account also brought goods.
Some netizens left a message under the account to support Ms. Bu's "husband". Netizens replied: "Huahua is happy, with both sons and daughters" "Like Huahua's husband"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 6 (Release) Several city management officers tried to confiscate the items on an old man's electric bike, but the old man held on to the items and refused to let go, and kept begging the city management officers: Can't I just leave? 
Seeing that the city management officers still refused to let him go, the old man knelt down and kowtowed to the city management officers, "I beg you" 
A passerby also pleaded for the old man: Isn't this a harmonious society?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 2, CCTV Spring Festival Gala released the official mascot "Si Sheng Sheng". Because "Si" sounds like "death", netizens ridiculed it.
Netizens said it would be better to call it "Si Quan Jia" or "Si Qiao Qiao". Some netizens also said "This snake is ugly. Why is the mascot so ugly?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 6, several netizens were live-broadcasting together.
One of the netizens said: If there is a person like Chairman Mao, will you follow him?
Another netizen replied "This breakfast (rebellion) must be eaten"
Then the live broadcast room was banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that in August this year, residents of the collapse area jointly with local enterprises sent a contact letter to the subway department that was under construction nearby, stating that there had been frequent vibrations and loud noises recently and suspected that they were related to the subway construction. They hoped to get a reply, but nothing came of it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
South Korea's National Assembly rejected the "Kim Gun-hee Special Prosecution Law" with 198 votes to 102, which was less than two-thirds of the votes in favor.
After the result was released, all the ruling party members left the venue, so that the subsequent impeachment vote on Yoon Seok-yeol would not reach a sufficient number of votes. The opposition party members then stood up collectively and called on the ruling party members to return to the venue to vote.
At present, the impeachment vote has begun. Two members of the ruling party have returned to the venue to participate in the vote.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 7 (released), Shandong. An old man recalled the three-year famine: At that time, exaggeration was popular, and everyone was falsifying grain production. Whoever reported more would be praised. "200 kilograms was reported as 2,000 kilograms." And at that time, the food was not as good as that of pigs. If you didn't listen to the leader, he would not give you food.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 6, a high school student in Jiangxi (publishing IP) posted that the school stipulates that students must go to the toilet in designated pits.
A blogger said: This is a planned toilet, will it be the same when arranging a job after graduation?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 7, a large number of protesters gathered around the streets of the South Korean National Assembly, demanding the impeachment of Yoon Seok-yeol.
People at the scene sang G-Dragon's song "Crooked" in unison

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 7, during a live broadcast, a treasure appraisal anchor showed a "Capital Guardian" medal awarded to the 8964 Tiananmen Square Martial Law Troops, and the live broadcast room was instantly banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Last month, Wuhan Huazhong Agricultural University was exposed to a cat abuse incident, with dozens of cats poisoned by someone.
On November 28, another cat was found glued to the ground downstairs of the school's female dormitory, and its death was extremely tragic. The photographer said, "The cat's limbs were broken and firmly glued to the ground."
The school reported: Su crushed 5 adult drugs into powder, mixed water and fed them to stray cats on campus, and gave the student a serious warning.
Recently, some students used banners and other methods to publicize this incident near the school, but the banners were snatched away by security guards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Many bloggers said that the videos and pictures they posted on Weibo of South Korean people rallying to protest against Yin Xiyue were deleted or blocked by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 5, Langfang, Hebei. The man said that he had been looking for a job recently, but was repeatedly rejected because of his age. Finally, he found a job in an auto parts factory.
But when he arrived, he found that the accommodation conditions were very poor, the daily salary was 150 yuan, and he had to hold back a month's salary, so the man had to give up.
On the way back, he looked at the "Fu" sign on the roadside and sighed: With society progressing so fast, why don't workers get corresponding treatment and respect?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many netizens reported on social platforms that after using the FaceTime function to talk with friends abroad, they received calls from the police and were asked to go to the police station to receive anti-fraud education. Some netizens' bank cards and mobile phone cards were restricted as a result.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Taiwanese internet celebrity "Minnan Wolf" has attracted millions of fans because he often promotes "two sides of the Taiwan Strait are one family" and other "patriotic" ideas on Chinese social media.
However, on December 6 (released), Minnan Wolf was a guest on the show of the well-known anti-communist internet celebrity "Ba Jiong", exposing the routine of the CCP buying influential internet celebrities to carry out propaganda to change the CCP's image in people's minds. This shocking reversal caught the fans of "Minnan Wolf" by surprise, and they exclaimed "So you are an anti-thief, you have been playing the opposite role!"
On the same day, "Minnan Wolf" also uploaded the last video on Douyin in China to satirize China. On the morning of December 7, "Minnan Wolf" Douyin account was banned by the platform. After a large number of fans and netizens who were broken learned about this, they began to attack and cyberbully him. Taiwanese internet celebrities such as "Han Guoren", "Mai Gou 886" and "Lin Xiaoxiong" also made videos accusing him of being two-faced.
"Minnan Wolf" said: China is really too free!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 6, after the release of "China's United Front Documentary Part 1", "Minnan Wolf" uploaded his last video on Douyin in China, in which "Ba Jiong" also appeared.
The next morning, the Douyin account of "Minnan Wolf" was blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Tianyancha officially announced that the real name of "Minnan Wolf" is Chen Baiyuan, and he is associated with three companies. Among them, "Minlang Bense (Quanzhou) Music Culture Co., Ltd." was sued for labor disputes and contract disputes. On May 30 this year, the company was listed as a dishonest person subject to enforcement for "refusing to perform the obligations determined by the effective legal documents despite having the ability to perform."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 6, Beijing. A woman posted that she was laid off by JD.com last month and is now being sued by the company and asked to pay 200,000 yuan in liquidated damages.
The woman questioned: Is this a new way for the company to increase revenue?
The post has been deleted, and the homepage of the account says "All posts have been reported by JD."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The impeachment of South Korean President Yoon Seok-yeol was not passed
The South Korean National Assembly voted on the impeachment of President Yoon Seok-yeol this afternoon. The ruling People's Power Party decided not to participate in the vote and left the room collectively. In the end, 195 people voted but failed to reach the legal number, and the impeachment was not established. Lee Jae-myung, leader of the Democratic Party of Korea, criticized the People's Power Party as a "party of internal turmoil" and said that Yoon Seok-yeol, who has become "the biggest risk to South Korea," must be impeached.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 7, Hunan. Migrant workers were demanding their wages outside China First Metallurgical Construction Company and were beaten by project leaders with sticks.
The leader, who was driving a Land Rover, said to the workers who were demanding their wages: You poor loser, you are so poor that you can't even afford to eat!
Afterwards, the workers were beaten to the point of being hospitalized, but the police station and the boss kept passing the buck.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 7, host Da Bing distributed free down jackets in Linyi, Xi'an, Jinan, Changsha and other places, targeting students with financial difficulties and young people who have recently lost their jobs.
As a result, many people came to the scene to "take advantage of the situation". One netizen said: He went with his unemployment certificate, and found that many people were wearing down jackets and holding Apple phones, so he left with a chill.
Another netizen said that he saw someone carrying an LV bag to receive a down jacket.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 6, Sichuan.
It was reported online that the panda "Fubao" at the Shenshuping Giant Panda Base was suspected of being ill, but the base did not care, which caused concern among panda fans.
On that day, a "Fubao" fan from Taiwan held a banner at the base to express his blessings for Fubao. As a result, he was punished by the China Giant Panda Center and banned from entering for half a year.
Even Xinhua News Agency issued a special article announcing the punishment of this Taiwanese.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 6, Sichuan. It was revealed online that the panda "Fubao" at the Shenshuping base was suspected of being ill, but the base did not care. A fan of "Fubao" from Taiwan held a banner at the base to express his blessings for Fubao, but was punished by the China Giant Panda Center and banned from entering the base for half a year.
